name: moomoo-bundle
description: A usable bundle for making moomoo.io hacks from
author: javedpension

scripts.build: biome format --write && biome check --write && node ./config/esbuild.config.js --watch && sudo chmod -R u+rwx,g+rwx,o+rwx . && npx documentation build src/** -f html -o doct && git config --global user.email "javedpension@gmail.com" && git config --global user.name "javedpension" && git add . && git commit -m "automatic commit" && git push origin master && clear
